nodes.name: InternallyEndorsed

nodes.documentation:
@dev Deploy an instance of InternallyEndorsed referencing an endorsement database.
 @param endorsementDatabase The address of the endorsement database

nodes.name: updateEndorsement

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes memory,string memory,bytes32,uint256,bytes memory) view external returns (bool)

nodes.name: revokeEndorsement
getEndorsement
getRevokedStatus
getCurrentRevoked
toBytes
InternallyEndorsed

nodes.documentation:
@dev Deploy an instance of InternallyEndorsed referencing an endorsement database.
 @param endorsementDatabase The address of the endorsement database

nodes.name: updateEndorsement

typeDescriptions.typeString: function (bytes memory,string memory,bytes32,uint256,bytes memory) view external returns (bool)

nodes.name: revokeEndorsement
getEndorsement
getRevokedStatus
getCurrentRevoked
toBytes

constructor.details: Deploy an instance of InternallyEndorsed referencing an endorsement database.

params.endorsementDatabase: The address of the endorsement database

getCurrentRevoked().details: Get the revocation status of the combination of the current endorsement information fields

getEndorsement().details: Get the content of the expiration information fields
getEndorsement().return: signature, domain name, certificate identifer, expiration date

getRevokedStatus(string,bytes32,uint256).details: Get the revocation status of the endorsement dentoted by '_domain', '_certID', '_expiration'

params._certID: Certificate identifer of the checked endorsment
params._domain: Domain name of the checked endorsement
params._expiration: Expiration date of the checked endorsement

getRevokedStatus(string,bytes32,uint256).return: true if revoked, false if not revoked or unknown

revokeEndorsement(bytes,string,bytes32,u.details: Anyone can mark an endorsment as revoked when they posses a private key corresponding to a certID contained in 'allCertIDs''es' is used to validate the revocation

updateEndorsement(bytes,string,bytes32,u.details: Owner can update the endorsement information, signature is NOT validated

params._certID: Certificate identifer of the new endorsement
params._domain: Domain name of the new endorsement
params._expiration: Expiration date of the new endorsement

getCurrentRevoked().notice: Get the revocation status of the current endorsement

getEndorsement().notice: Get the endorsement information of the contract

getRevokedStatus(string,bytes32,uint256).notice: Get the revocation status of an arbitrary endorsement combination

revokeEndorsement(bytes,string,bytes32,u.notice: Revoke an endorsment previously or currently used to endorse the contract

updateEndorsement(bytes,string,bytes32,u.notice: Can be used by the owner of the contract to update the endorsement
